poke_power.name: Burning Energy
poke_power.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may turn all basic Energy attached to all of your Pokémon into {R} Energy for the rest of the turn. This power can’t be used if Charizard is affected by a Special Condition.

attacks.name: Scorching Whirlwind
attacks.effect: Flip 2 coins. If 1 of them is tails, discard 2 Energy cards attached to Charizard. If both are tails, discard all Energy cards attached to Charizard.
